message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you at $11,000, which is a competitive price considering its worth. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is simply too low for me. However, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split the difference - I'll offer you the product for $10,250. This is a fair price, and I'm confident it will work well for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $10,000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
